mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, P.* from (select * from paidMovie where oname like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by num desc) P) where R between #{row.startRow} and #{row.lastRow}

select * from (select * from (select rownum r, b.* from (select basicmovie.* from basicmovie, paidmovie where basicmovie.num=paidmovie.bnum) b) where title like '%'||#{title}||'%' or eng_title like '%'||#{title}||'%') where r between #{rowMaker.startRow} and #{rowMaker.lastRow}

select * from (select rownum r, l.* from (select lowpricemovie.* from lowpricemovie,paidmovie where lowpricemovie.num=paidmovie.lnum and lowpricemovie.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' order by lowpricemovie.num desc) l) where r between #{rowMaker.startRow} and #{rowMaker.lastRow}
select count(num) from (select paidmovie.* from paidmovie, basicmovie where basicmovie.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' and paidmovie.bnum>0 and paidmovie.bnum=basicmovie.num)
select count(num) from paidmovie where lnum>0
select * from paidMovie where bnum > 0 order by num desc
select * from paidMovie where lnum > 0 order by num desc
select title from basicMovie where num=#{num}
select title from lowPriceMovie where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into paidMovie values(NVL((select max(num) from paidMovie),0)+1, #{price}, #{fname}, #{oname}, #{bNum},#{lNum})
mapper.update: update paidMovie set price=#{price}, fname=#{fname}, oname=#{oname} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(num) from paidMovie where oname like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select * from basicMovie where num=#{num} and title=#{title}
mapper.delete: delete from movieRequest where bnum=#{bNum} and lnum=#{lNum}
